"Master Dispatch" Extension for PowerDAT.com and TruckStop:

The "Master Dispatch" extension is a powerful and feature-rich tool designed to enhance the capabilities of dispatchers using PowerDAT.com and TruckStop, streamlining their workflow and improving efficiency in the dispatching process. This innovative extension is tailored to meet the specific needs of dispatchers, offering a range of essential functions to simplify their tasks and optimize resource management.

Key Features:

    Automated Email Sending:
    Say goodbye to manual email notifications and status updates. "Master Dispatch" automates the email communication process, allowing dispatchers to effortlessly send notifications, confirmations, and status updates to drivers, carriers, and customers. This not only saves time but also ensures timely and accurate communication, reducing the risk of errors.

    RPM Calculation:
    Keeping track of a truck's engine RPM (Revolutions Per Minute) is vital for optimizing fuel efficiency and monitoring engine health. With the "Master Dispatch" extension, dispatchers can conveniently calculate and monitor RPM data in real-time, enabling them to make informed decisions that promote cost savings and fleet maintenance.

    Advanced Filtering:
    "Master Dispatch" provides sophisticated filtering options, allowing dispatchers to refine and sort through vast amounts of data efficiently. Dispatchers can filter shipments based on various criteria, such as location, delivery window, carrier preferences, and load characteristics. This feature simplifies the dispatching process and helps dispatchers match the right shipments with the most suitable carriers.

    Path Visualization on Map:
    Visualizing the route and path of a shipment on a map is a vital aspect of effective dispatching. The extension offers an integrated mapping tool that displays the real-time location of each shipment and its planned route. Dispatchers can quickly assess the progress of each shipment, identify potential issues, and make proactive decisions to optimize delivery schedules.
